Articles.Content:
Hey everyone! With the New Horizon's flyby only several hours away, I've recreated the mission and spacecraft in KSP. Lots of fun! I liked doing a flyby mission and sticking to "real world" rules (maximum weight limit / launch vehicle.)

Anyways, here's the imgur album! Thanks for looking.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/xk1an)
